longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months:
 - for holders of normal, emergency or temporary passports
   issued to nationals of Slovenia;
Visa required, except for Nationals of Slovenia whose passport
or travel document state Uruguay as place of birth. 
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Slovenia will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- Minors born in Uruguay but with foreign parents
  
Additional Information:
- Extension of stay possible for additional 90 days
